data.title: Actors Born in 1935
data.meta_description: Birthdays in film & television in 1935. Browse actors, actresses and directors that were born in 1935 or search by date or keyword.
data.text:
David Vine, British sports broadcaster (BBC Match of the Day, World Snooker C'ships, Olympics coverage), born in Newton Abbot, England (d. 2009)

Jan 3 Jeremy Kemp, British actor (The Winds of War; The Blue Max), born in Chesterfield, England (d. 2019) [some sources give birth date as 3 Feb 1934]

Elvis Presley

American King of Rock and Roll ("Hound Dog"; "Love Me Tender"; "Heartbreak Hotel"; "Suspicious Minds"), and actor (Jailhouse Rock; King Creole), born in Tupelo, Mississippi

Nolan Miller, American fashion & jewellery designer (Dynasty, Love Boat), born in Burkburnett, Texas (d. 2012)

Bob Denver

American actor (Gilligan's Island, The Many Loves of Dobie Gillis), born in New Rochelle, New York [1] [2]

Richard "Dick" Enberg, American sportscaster (NBC, CBS, ESPN), born in Mt Clemens, Michigan (d. 2017)

Ghita Nørby, Danish actress

Jan 11 Melvyn Hayes [Melvyn Hyams], English actor (Gunner "Gloria Beaumont in 'It Ain't Half Hot Mum'), born in London, England

Ron Harper, American actor (Planet of the Apes (TV series); Wendy and Me), born in Turtle Creek, Pennsylvania (d. 2024)

Soumitra Chatterjee, Indian actor, playwright and poet (Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy), born in Calcutta, British India (d. 2020) [1]

About 1935

How Old? 88 or 89 years old

Generation: Silent Generation

Chinese Zodiac: Dog (Feb 14, 1934 - Feb 3, 1935),

Pig (Feb 4, 1935 - Jan 23, 1936)
